name: Parallels Desktop Floppy Disk Image File
summary: Learn about .FDD files and view a list of programs that open them.

content: Parallels Desktop for Mac is software that runs various operating systems, such as Windows, Linux, Android, and additional versions of macOS on Macs. The software emulates many of the components offered by an operating system, including floppy disk and CD/DVD drives. FDD files store floppy disk images, which you can load with Parallels Desktop for Mac, much the same way as physical floppy disks.

instructions: You can open an FDD file with Parallels Desktop for Mac on your Mac. To open an FDD file, select Configuration → Hardware → Floppy Disk in an opened virtual machine, then click "Choose an image file..." from the "Source" dropdown menu.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
